It was pretty much what I expected to get for 30$. I purchased the large hoodie, and it is definitely long enough on the body, but quite short on the sleeves. To get something that fits long arms you would have to size up multiple times. The zipper is incredibly sticky, and very troublesome to zip up, almost worrying. The fabric is quite fleecy, but also very thin and definitely cheap. The ironed on print is smaller than pictured, doesn’t even reach the pockets. So if you want something of higher quality, it’s definitely worth getting something more expensive.
